title: S17 Ep70: Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes-Stupid Criminals/Welcome to Audioboom
itunes:title: Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes-Stupid Criminals/Welcome to Audioboom
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals/ Welcome to Audioboom with Beer City Bruiser!

With the world and it's media being focused on just a few topics, we dig up the true crime topics that everyone is either talking about online, or you might have missed altogether!

Tim and Bruiser jump into The Ezra Miller case, and how the Flash actor is being compared to Manson! An Indiana Man appeals his life sentence for killing his ex-girlfriend and eating her, and Geico may owe millions over a woman's STD!

Check out where Beer City Bruiser will be in your area: Â https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
